Name: Sid Meier’s Civilization® VI
About the game: Civilization VI offers new ways to engage with your world: cities now physically expand across the map, active research in technology and culture unlocks new potential, and competing leaders will pursue their own agendas based on their historical traits as you race for one of five ways to achieve victory in the game. ‎‏‏‎‎‏‏‎ See the marvels of your empire spread across the map like never before. Build powerful specialty districts to specialize and boost city output. Customize each city to suit your needs or take advantage of the local terrain. Boost your civilization’s progress through history to unlock powerful bonuses before anyone else! To advance more quickly, use your units to actively explore, develop your environment, and discover new cultures. As the game progresses, so do your diplomatic relationships. From primitive first interactions where conflict is a fact of life, to late game alliances and negotiations.
